"A.P.242/2/26 10:00": "...Sara, why don't you rest on the ship while we go?"
"There's no point if Xiao's kin can't even make it herself."
"If it was you, wouldn't you be saying \"now's the the time to be unreasonable\"?"
"The Dragonkin are... How should I put this... There are many who lack restraint."
"Do not be alarmed. They are only greeting you. This is what I meant by lack of restraint."
"I have some affiliation with the Dragonkin, so I was hoping I could act as your guide."
"Moreover, we do not know when the enemy may strike. It would not hurt to bolster our fighting capabilities."
"You're the same as ever, Rela. You knew we would be coming?"

"〔Dragon oracle〕〔Rela of Ko〕
〔came to greet〕〔members of ARKS.〕"
